particleSystem
Class PSUtil

java.lang.Object
  particleSystem.PSUtil

public class PSUtil
extends java.lang.Object

This Class is for helping with the ParticleSystem
they don't affect the Core Application but are very usefull

Author:
fabianthelbind, fabianthelbind

                                  int radius,
                                  int size)
This a number of points circling around the center. for a smother path give him more segments

Parameters:
